feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 31.
